sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_ac3e0dcc83a432107f44e024ccda1e5d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve a Delivery Delay record where the status is calculated, allowing the agent to analyze available route options and penalty data before determining the optimal route.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Calculated Delivery Delay Lookup</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 19:14:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ac3e0dcc83a432107f44e024ccda1e5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculated Delivery Delay Lookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ac3e0dcc83a432107f44e024ccda1e5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:25</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_26a0ddc083e432107f44e024ccda1e96
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve the record's Chosen Option value for use in the webhook.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route Id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 19:24:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>26a0ddc083e432107f44e024ccda1e96</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_26a0ddc083e432107f44e024ccda1e96</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:23:17</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_cd2cedf7839032107f44e024ccda1eb6
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m"><sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m action="DELETE"><active>true</active><agent display_value="Route Financial Analysis Agent">13a625fb835032107f44e024ccda1eb1</agent><description>Calculates delay penalties for each proposed route, creates an incident summarizing the financial impact, and updates the Delivery Delay record.</description><display_output>true</display_output><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><inputs>[{"name":"record_sys_id","value":"","description":"Sys_id of the Delivery Delay record to processi","invalidMessage":null}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>WL4 Compute Financial Impact</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:46:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>cd2cedf7839032107f44e024ccda1eb6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>WL4 Compute Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_cd2cedf7839032107f44e024ccda1eb6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 02:46:32</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="WL4 Compute Financial Impact">c92ca5b7839032107f44e024ccda1e4a</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_a91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculates late hours and penalty costs for each proposed route using delivery window and penalty rate values.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"eta_minutes","description":"numerical value only for eta minutes"},{"name":"delivery_window_hours","description":"numerical value only for eta minutes"},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":"numerical value only for eta minutes"}]</input_schema><name>Compute Route Financial Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
  // inputs expected: eta_minutes, delivery_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate
  var etaMinutes = inputs.eta_minutes;
  var deliveryWindow = inputs.delivery_window_hours;
  var penaltyRate = inputs.stockout_penalty_rate;
  // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
  var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;
  // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
  var overageHours = etaHours.toFixed(2) - deliveryWindow;
  // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate
  var calculatedImpact = overageHours * penaltyRate;
  return {
    calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 04:57:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compute Route Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 18:44:15</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_e03e0dcc83a432107f44e024ccda1e56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Sends delivery delay data from ServiceNow to n8n for route dispatch automation.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"}]</input_schema><name>Webhook Tool</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://kieraearvin.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/pepsico-delivery-delay';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 19:14:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e03e0dcc83a432107f44e024ccda1e56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Webhook Tool</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_e03e0dcc83a432107f44e024ccda1e56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 02:39:08</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:40:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3de1a90083a832107f44e024ccda1e5b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_3de1a90083a832107f44e024ccda1e5b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:40:16</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Retrieve Webhook Value">fde1a90083a832107f44e024ccda1e58</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_1b7fc14083e432107f44e024ccda1e25
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>update the record</description><input_schema>[{"name":"chosen_option","description":"memory.chosen_option JSON"},{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 19:19:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1b7fc14083e432107f44e024ccda1e25</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_1b7fc14083e432107f44e024ccda1e25</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:25</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_6ba7454083a432107f44e024ccda1ed2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This Al agent optimizes delivery routing by analyzing calculated delivery delay records. It selects the optimal route based on ETA and financial penalty impact, updates the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route and status, adjusts incident priority, and triggers an outbound webhook to n8n for dispatch execution.</description><instructions>You will be provided with the route id.
1. Use the provided route id to Pull Delivery Delay Details.
2. Analyze the route options and select an option_id that optimizes the corresponding distance_miles and calculated_impact. Store the **entire route object** (including option_id, route_number, distance_miles, and eta_minutes) in your memory as memory.chosen_option, not just the option_id string. memory.chosen_option must be a structured JSON object, not plain text.
3. Update Delivery Delay Record of route id with the entire memory.chosen_option JSON object,
4. Update the associated Incident record's Urgency based on financial severity. Use the following guidelines to set Urgency: - If the option costs LESS than $500, then set Urgency to 3- Low. - If the option costs BETWEEN $501-$1000, then set Urgency to 2- Medium. - If the option costs MORE than $1000, then set Urgency to 1- High.
5. Retrieve Webhook Value using the route id. You will use this data to trigger the webhook.
6. Trigger n8n webhook with the Route ID and Retrieved Webhook Value.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The AGENT is capable of optimizing delivery routes by analyzing calculated delivery delay records. It selects the optimal route based on estimated time of arrival (ETA) and financial penalty impact, ensuring efficient and cost-effective delivery operations. - The AGENT can retrieve delivery delay details using a provided route id, which is essential for analyzing and selecting the optimal delivery route. - The AGENT is capable of analyzing multiple route options and selecting the optimal one based on distance and calculated impact. It stores the entire route object in memory as a structured JSON object for accurate record-keeping and decision-making. - The AGENT can update the Delivery Delay Record with the chosen route details, ensuring that the selected route is accurately documented and available for future reference. - The AGENT can update the urgency of an associated incident record based on the financial severity of the selected route option, using predefined guidelines to set the urgency level. - The AGENT can utilize the 'Update Incident Priority' tool to adjust the priority of linked incidents based on penalty costs, ensuring that higher penalties result in faster response times. - The AGENT is capable of retrieving the necessary webhook value using the route id and triggering the n8n webhook with the Route ID and Retrieved Webhook Value, facilitating the execution of dispatch operations.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>This AI agent optimizes delivery routing by analyzing calculated delivery delay records. It selects the optimal route based on ETA and financial penalty impact, updates the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route and status, adjusts incident priority, and triggers an outbound webhook to n8n for dispatch execution.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 18:49:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>6ba7454083a432107f44e024ccda1ed2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_6ba7454083a432107f44e024ccda1ed2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 03:00:23</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_fde1a90083a832107f44e024ccda1e58
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve the record's Chosen Option value for the use in the webhook</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 20:40:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fde1a90083a832107f44e024ccda1e58</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_fde1a90083a832107f44e024ccda1e58</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:50:18</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m"><sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><agent display_value="Route Financial Analysis Agent">13a625fb835032107f44e024ccda1eb1</agent><description>Calculates late hours and penalty costs for each proposed route using delivery window and penalty rate values.</description><display_output>true</display_output><execution_mode>autopilot</execution_mode><inputs>[{"name":"eta_minutes","value":"","description":"numerical value only for eta minutes","invalidMessage":null},{"name":"delivery_window_hours","value":"","description":"numerical value only for eta minutes","invalidMessage":null},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","value":"","description":"numerical value only for eta minutes","invalidMessage":null}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Compute Route Financial Impact</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 04:57:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a51a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1eb8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compute Route Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_a51a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1eb8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 18:39:58</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Compute Route Financial Impact">a91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea9</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_a03e890083e432107f44e024ccda1ede
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the linked Incident record's priority based on the penalty cost determined in the calculated_impact JSON. Higher penalties raise the incident's urgency for faster response.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"The sys _id of the linked incident (from Delivery Delay)."},{"name":"penalty_cost","description":"Total penalty amount from the selected route."},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Incident Priority</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 19:14:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a03e890083e432107f44e024ccda1ede</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Incident Priority</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a03e890083e432107f44e024ccda1ede</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 19:14:11</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculates delay penalties for each proposed route, creates an incident summarizing the financial impact, and updates the Delivery Delay record.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"record_sys_id","description":"Sys_id of the Delivery Delay record to processi"}]</input_schema><name>WL4 Compute Financial Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
    try {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
        gr.initialize();
        gr.short_description = 'AI Agent test incident';
        var id = gr.insert();
        outputs.result = id ? 'Incident created with sys_id=' + id : 'Insert failed';
    } catch (e) {
        outputs.result = 'Error: ' + e;
    }
})(inputs, outputs);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:46:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c92ca5b7839032107f44e024ccda1e4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>WL4 Compute Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_c92ca5b7839032107f44e024ccda1e4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 04:16:26</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>When the trigger Pending_Delivery_Delay is activated, retrieve the Route ID from the record. You will run the Delivery Delay Financial Analyzer and then run the Route Decision Agent to select the most optimal alternative route.
You are triggered by Pending_Delivery_Delay. You will retrieve the Route ID from the record. Store this Route ID in memory to run both Agents. Use the tools as exactly as directed.
1. Use Financial Analyzer to find the calculated impact of delivery delay. 2. Use the Route Decision Agent to choose the most optimal route.</base_plan><description>Automatically handle truck breakdowns by calculating financial penalties, creating incidents, and deciding reroutes</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Supply Chain Delay Handling</internal_name><name>Supply Chain Delay Handling</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-02 07:32:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>51bbb896831832107f44e024ccda1ef6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Chain Delay Handling</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_51bbb896831832107f44e024ccda1ef6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 01:59:26</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Supply Chain Delay Handling">b2adf896831832107f44e024ccda1e2c</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_13a625fb835032107f44e024ccda1eb1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyze Delivery Delay records, look up contract terms, compute penalties per route, and update the record to calculated with full details.</description><instructions>First, perform Financial Impact Analysis. Second, create Delayed Delivery incident. Third, update the Delivery Delay record with the calculated impact.
1. Pull the Delayed Delivery details of the Route (Customer ID, Proposed Routes) and store this information in memory.
2. Use the Customer ID of the Delayed Delivery to Locate the Supply Agreement for the Customer. Store the numerical value Customer's Delivery Window Hours and numerical value for Stockout Penalty Rate in memory.
FINANCIAL ANALYSIS INSTRUCTIONS 3.1 There are multiple options in the proposed routes. Store the numerical value of each ETA Minutes in memory. 3.2 Run the Financial Impact Calculation tool separately for EACH of the delivery's proposed route option values. There will be a unique calculation for each of the ETA minutes.
4. Return the Calculation for each proposed route combined in **USD with $** in the output format "Alternative Route Option 1 Calculated Impact: , Alternative Route Option 2 Calculated Impact: " with a line break after each option. NOTE: IF THE CALCULATED IMPACT IS A NEGATIVE NUMBER, RETURN $0.00. This is the Calculated Impact. 4.1 Store the Calculated Impact in memory.
Use the Route ID, Customer Name, Problem Description, and Calculated Impact stored in memory to create the Delayed Delivery Incident record. In the Incident Description, insert a line break between {{problem_description}} and {{calculated_impact}}. Store the created Incident's Sys ID in memory.
Update the Delivery Delay record that matches the user provided Route ID with the Calculated Impact and the Incident Sys ID.
5. Pass the **route_id** to the next agent</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The Route Financial Analysis Agent is proficient in calculating and recording the financial impact of route delays, ensuring that each Delivery Delay record transitions from 'pending' to 'calculated' after analysis. This involves precise data lookups and calculations, as well as clear communication of results. - The agent is capable of performing a detailed Financial Impact Analysis by pulling Delayed Delivery details, including Customer ID and Proposed Routes, and storing this information in memory for further processing. - The agent can locate the Supply Agreement for a customer using the Customer ID, storing the Delivery Window Hours and Stockout Penalty Rate in memory to facilitate accurate financial impact calculations. - The agent utilizes the Compute Route Financial Impact tool to calculate the financial impact for each proposed route option by using ETA Minutes, Delivery Window Hours, and Stockout Penalty Rate. This ensures a unique calculation for each route, which is crucial for accurate financial analysis. - The agent is capable of formatting and returning the calculated financial impact for each proposed route in USD, ensuring that negative impacts are reported as $0.00. This capability ensures clarity and accuracy in financial reporting. - The agent can create a Delayed Delivery Incident record using the Route ID, Customer Name, Problem Description, and Calculated Impact stored in memory. This includes inserting line breaks in the Incident Description for clarity and storing the Incident's Sys ID in memory. - The agent uses the Update Delivery Delay tool to update the Delivery Delay record with the Calculated Impact and the Incident Sys ID, ensuring that the record is current and accurate. This involves using CRUD operations to modify the database entry. - The agent is capable of passing the route_id to the next agent, facilitating seamless integration and continuation of the process in the logistics workflow.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>The Route Financial Analysis Agent is an analytical automation agent that calculates and records the financial impact of route delays for PepsiCo logistics. It communicates clearly, performs data lookups and calculations precisely, and ensures each Delivery Delay record transitions from pending to calculated after analysis.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:31:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>13a625fb835032107f44e024ccda1eb1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>57</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_13a625fb835032107f44e024ccda1eb1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 02:59:12</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_e91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves the customers delivery window hours and stockout penalty rate using the customer_id from the Delivery Delay record.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"The customer_id from the Delivery Delay record"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Supply Agreement Info</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 04:57:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Supply Agreement Info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_e91a4e7f839432107f44e024ccda1ea3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 18:44:14</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create an incident based on truck delivery delay</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_it","description":"route id"},{"name":"customer_name","description":"customer name of customer id"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"formatted calculated impact"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 18:24:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>45d2c580836432107f44e024ccda1ea0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_45d2c580836432107f44e024ccda1ea0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:05:56</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates the Delivery Delay record with calculated impact.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route id"},{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"create an incident sys id"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"updates calculated impact"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 05:32:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>b6325e33831832107f44e024ccda1e4a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">0ef7ecd6835432107f44e024ccda1e9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_b6325e33831832107f44e024ccda1e4a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:05:56</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
